title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior of custom cookie name in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The behavior of the custom cookie name in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 is not as expected.
EB: According to Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, the custom cookie name should affect the URL rewriting. Therefore, I would expect the Reload link to be: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Navigate to http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp 
2. Observe the Reload link and check if the URL includes the custom cookie name in the expected manner.
